name: Siesta (The Chromian)
description:
A game where you shoot with sleep darts.

All of the assets came from the GB Studio Community Asset Pack. You can find the credits there.

Made using GB Studio.

Controls: 

  • Z (a on real hardware): Advance text
  • X (b on real hardware): Shoot
  • Enter (start on real hardware): See shard/ammo count (shards are not important right now but will be in the post-jam version, ammo is important)
  • Arrow keys (dpad on real hardware): Move

Note:

Due to the game being too easy, you have limited ammo now. Ammo regenerates every 2.5 seconds.

That's really all there is to say.
